name: The Powerpuff Girls: Battle Him
description: The City of Townsville! Sweet little Bubbles is happily coloring, when suddenly the Powerpuff Hotline rings. HIM has put a spell on the Citizens of Townsville and they can't move! Uh oh! No more nice little Bubbles. It's time for Bubbles to go - hardcore. She must rescue her friends from HIM's evil clutches and save the day!
